profile.name: Matteo Golin
profile.description:
I'm a computer systems engineering student with a passion for automation, design and abstraction within computing technologies.
I'm looking for a position that can provide me with experience in the technology field and challenge me to grow my skill-set.

highlights: Employed strong time management skills in order to complete prep and cleaning tasks before the night service began.
Developed a high degree of familiarity with kitchen equipment and cook times to complete meals in a timely manner for patrons.
Coordinated with wedding planners, brides, and grooms to schedule times for photo events throughout the wedding day.
Ensured timely delivery of photos to clients.
Creatively managed photo shoots to match the results desired by clients/brands.
Launched a portfolio website and networked with industry professionals to gain clientele.
Participated in several on-site lab experiments and expert lectures about the marine ecology of New Brunswick.
Co-founded a game development club and created a Discord.py bot to track member progress and responsibilities, and post announcements automatically.
Collaborated with members to create prototype games and improve their skills.
Worked with co-founders to develop workshop structures, club meeting formats and gain school board approval.

description: Placed within the top 25% of all contestants.
Achieved the highest score within St. Francis Xavier High School.
Recipient of the Jim Tubman leadership award for outstanding leadership in the school community.
Achieved the highest grade in 2020 and 2021.
Achieved the highest grade in 2017 and 2021.

projects.title: typeTracker
projects.description: A program that analyzes personal typing statistics from Keybr.com and displays them graphically according to user request.

projects.title: WMS
projects.description: A Flask warehouse management system desktop application that displays database information in an interactive GUI.

projects.title: beanO
projects.description: React mobile web application using Django Rest Framework for backend API. Graphically displayed and allowed addition to a collection of jelly beans.

projects.title: cypher
projects.description: Custom Google Assistant that uses a Flask web API to complete requests sent by Google Assistant and send responses to be used by the application.
